description:
My place is close to the express subway at 168th St, Coogans, Columbia Wine Co, and many other interesting and tasty food choices. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings, the location, the cosiness, the warm rooms on a cold night. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

You will have access to 1 bedroom, with a double bed, a living room, kitchen and bathroom.

I will not be available during the stay.

If you have cat allergies, please note that there is a cat that lives in this apartment that will not be present during your stay.
name: Spacious, yet cosy, 1-bedroom apt in the Heights
